data.text:
2012 Football Roster

Choose a Player:

67 Charles Segura

Position Offensive Line

Height 6-2

Weight 316

Class Senior

Hometown San Antonio, TX

Highschool McCollum

Bio

Stats

Biography

2011 (Junior): Segura posted a perfect 4.00 GPA during the 2011-12 school year. He earned First Team Capital One Academic All-District VI and all-Lone Star Conference Academic Team honors. He was named to the LSC Commissioner’s Honor Roll. He started every game of the season on the offensive line. He was part of a unit that averaged over 300 yards per game and gave up only 13 sacks on the season.

2010 (Sophomore): Segura earned Academic All-LSC honors and started all 11 games. He was part of an offensive line that paved the way for Trent Rios to rush for a school record 888 yards. Overall, the offense averaged 153 yards rushing per game. He was named Incarnate Word’s Student-Athlete of the Year.

2009 (Freshman): Segura started all 10 games on the offensive line as a freshman. The offense averaged 29 points per game and over 300 yards per game while allowing only 12 sacks on the season.

Previous: Segura originally signed with Midwestern State out of high school, but red-shirted his lone season.

High School: Segura was named the District 29-4A Most Valuable Player as a senior at McCollum High School.

Personal: Segura is studying accounting and was born on December 8, 1988.
